name: (ds) data analysis
description: Tasks related to analyzing, interpreting, and understanding data.

name: (ds) data quality
description: Issues related to data quality, cleanliness, or accuracy.

name: (ds) experimentation
description: Tasks related to conducting experiments or testing different approaches.

name: (ds) model evaluation
description: Tasks related to evaluating the performance of machine learning models.

name: (ds) model training
description: Issues related to training machine learning models.

name: (ds) visualization
description: Issues related to data visualization and creating charts or graphs.

name: bug
description: A defect or error in the software.

name: deployment
description: Issues related to deploying into production

name: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to existing documentation.

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists.

name: feature
description: A new feature that is being developed.

name: help wanted
description: This issue requires extra attention or expertise.

name: infrastructure
description: Issues related to the underlying infrastructure or tools used.

name: invalid
description: This issue is not valid or relevant.

name: maintenance
description: Tasks related to maintaining and updating existing code or models.

name: question
description: Further information is needed to resolve the issue.

name: research
description: Tasks related to exploring new research areas or techniques.

name: wontfix
description: This issue will not be addressed.
